mean_cn: n. 捷径；快捷之法；  adj. 有简便方法的
mean_en: a quicker or shorter way of getting to a place; a way of doing something that is quicker than the usual way
sentence: I cheated using my own special shortcut to escape the maze.
sentence_trans: 我走捷径逃出了迷宫，算是作弊吧。
word_etyma: short短 + cut削减，剪裁 → 长路被剪成短路 → 捷径，快捷方式
